Question: SenseGlove CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SenseGlove Nova | Haptic Virtual Reality Gloves

- 9-axis absolute orientation sensor in the wrist
- 4 sensors capturing thumb and finger movements
- Optional fusion with computer-vision algorithms for hand location and finger tracking accuracy
- 4 proprietary passive force feedback modules delivering up to 20N force
- 2 Linear Resonance Actuators haptic motors and 1 voice coil haptic actuator
- 3450mAh Lithium-Ion Battery, 2-3 hours of simulation time
- 320g (11.3 oz) per glove, 2.4GHz wireless serial communication
- Extensive software development kit (SDK) for Unity and Unreal Engine
- SenseGlove proprietary Computer-Vision for hand location
- Compatible with Standalone and Base Station tracked headsets
- Used for VR training, enterprise VR solutions, and research applications
- Completely wireless, with advanced force-feedback and vibrotactile feedback technology
